alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 7:59PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The whole island of Guam. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 758 PM ChST, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in Guam. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Guam is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
